description.black-white:
The user dances with an odd rhythm that
compels the target to mimic it, making the
target’s Ability the same as the user’s.

The user dances with an odd rhythm that
compels the target to mimic it, making the
target’s Ability the same as the user’s.

effect.full: Changes the target's ability to match the user's.  This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
effect.shortEffect: Copies the user's ability onto the target.
